name: FNF Ruv Test (StefanN)
description:
FNF Ruv Test

Ruvyzvat, or Ruv for short, is an escaped criminal and a trusted friend of Sarvente in the Mid-Fight Masses. In the third song Zavodila, when things get tricky, intervenes. Many things about him are shrouded in mystery. Besides, his singing is so powerful that the church is shaking.

Ruvyzvat Test | Friday Night Funkin

Ruv is just a secondary character from Friday Night Funkin' Mid Fight Masses, so it have just one song, and no hidden or special animation.

Ruv has pale skin with gray stripes. He is wearing a gray Ushanka with black stripes on the ear flaps, a black eye patch with an unknown symbol, a gray snow jacket, black pants, and black snow boots.

Read more here: https://fridaynightfunking.fandom.com/wiki/Ruv

Play the online official game: https://www.play-games.com/game/26907/friday-night-funkin-mid-fight-masses.html

Download from GB: https://gamebanana.com/mods/44345
